attributes.action: Cancel GCSE exams is too much pressure for pupils at school
attributes.additional_details: I feel stressful about my GCSE exams i feel like I’m not learning nothing at school my teachers are going too fast over the topics that we need to know and I think this is not good for us personally i can hold all this pressure
attributes.background: GCSE exams are starting to getting us stressful and therefore they should be canceled.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066

We understand that the current situation is stressful for many people, including students. Student Minds, a mental health charity for students, is collating guidance and developing resources to support students experiencing stress as a result of the current situation, which you may find useful: https://www.studentminds.org.uk/coronavirus.html
